data.description: This lovely patio home is in the sought-after community of Orchards of Park Ridge, a 55-plus community. Nicely finished, it offers a first floor master & guest bedroom, with additional bedroom/bonus room upstairs. Other features include gas fireplace in living room, plantation shutters, continuous hot water, whisper-quiet garage door. Enjoy the maintenance-free community w/ no mowing or hedge trimming. You’ll love the location, close to 985, The Mall of GA and an endless array of restaurants. It’s a golfer’s dream with several golf courses close by: Chateau Elan, Hamilton Mill, Lanier Legacy, Reunion & Royal Lakes.
